inn1.comm: Sri Lanka are away, RP gets a bit too straight with his first delivery and Jayasuriya uses the angle into him to work the ball behind square
good length delivery outside off stump, Sangakkara drops it with soft hands towards the off side and  calls for the single
short of a length delivery lifts sharply outside off stump and beats Jayasuriya's attempted back-foot defence
good length once again on off and middle, Jayasuriya moves back and across and defends towards the bowler
that's poor from RP, he's slanted one down leg side and the ball has clipped Jayasuriya's thigh on its way to the fine-leg boundary
excellent length and line this time outside off stump, Jayasuriya moves forward to drive but gets beaten by a bit of movement away from him
short of a length on leg and middle, Sangakkara moves across his stumps and nudges the ball towards midwicket
good length delivery pitches outside off stump and slants away from Sangakkara who lets the ball go through to Dhoni
good length just outside off stump, the ball keeps a bit low and bounces a second time before Dhoni collects it
the ball rises a bit more from just short of a length, Sangakkara moves back and across to play it but misses and gets struck on the box, ouch!
this time Sangakkara fends at the ball off the front foot and gets a thick outside edge that runs wide of slips and beats the man on the third man boundary
good length from Ishant outside off stump, Sangakkara stays in his crease and defends towards cover
good length from RP angling into the left-hander, Jayasuriya defends on the off side
RP strays towards leg stump again, Jayasuriya tries to work the ball behind square but gets hit on the thigh, Dhoni gets a glove on to it but can't stop it cleanly , he looks a bit stiff
defended off the front foot towards the off side
RP sends down the first bouncer of the day, Jayasuriya ducks under it
short and wide outside off stump, Jayasuriya moves back and cuts the ball hard with those powerful forearms, luckily for RP it's hit to the fielder at point
Jayasuriya uses RP's angle to work the ball from middle stump towards midwicket for a single
tight line and length from Ishant, on middle and off, Jayasuriya stays in his crease and defends towards the off side
this time the line is a little outside off which allows Jayasuriya to punch towards mid-off and run a quick single
Ishant strays on to leg stump and Sangakkara effortlessly flicks the ball off his pads towards deep square leg, RP Singh runs across from long leg and fields
better line on middle and off, Sangakkara gets behind the line on the back foot and defends towards Ishant

caught! Ishant banged it in short down leg side, Sangakkara tried to pull it but got a sizable edge through to Dhoni who moved quickly to his right to pull of a diving catch, Sangakkara didn't even wait for the umpire's decision, off he went
short and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene reaches out and cuts the ball towards third man
a good length delivery angles across the right-hander from over the wicket, Jayawardene lets it go through to Dhoni
straighter line on middle and off, Jayawardene moves forward and defends towards the bowler
Jayawardene gets on to the front foot and opens the face to guide a good length delivery towards point

134kmh outside off stump, Jayawardene pushes towards the off side and calls for the single, Jayasuriya responds, he and RP might have had a collision as RP went for the ball but the bowler aborted his run
Jayasuriya backs away and mis-hits a short ball towards the off side for a single
excellent length and line on off stump, Jayawardene defends on the front foot

Dropped! But only because Yuvraj did superbly to even get a finger on it. Jayasuriya tried to hit a good length delivery down the ground but mis-hit it in the air over the bowler's head, Yuvraj ran to his left from mid-off and dived full length, he got fingertips of his left hand on the ball but couldn;t hold on
short of a length delivery which Jayasuriya pulls towards long leg
width offered outside off stump but Jayawardene can't beat point with his cut
this time Jayawardene waits a bit more and manages to cut the ball behind point for a single
Jayasuriya hits across the line and pulls the ball in the air but over the infield at midwicket, he didn't time that well either but the running is swift between the wickets
Jayawardene defends the last ball off the over back towards the bowler on the front foot
short ball and Jayasuriya waits on the back foot and pulls towards deep square leg where Ojha runs to his right to make the save
tight line and length on off stump, Jayawardene moves smoothly on to the front foot and defends towards cover
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Jayawardene takes a step forward and tries to cut the ball through the off side, he gets a thick bottom edge into the ground
tighter line and length closer to off stump, Jayawardene stays in his crease and blocks
Jayawardene leans across and flicks a low full toss towards long leg
short and wide delivery, Jayasuriya gives himself a little room by moving towards leg and cuts the ball over cover, he's timed this splendidly
Ishant appealed for lbw but that was missing leg, Jayawardene tried to flick but missed and got hit on the pad
now the length wasn't bad at all but Jayasuriya planted his front foot forward and slogged the ball from outside off over midwicket for four
short ball and Jayasuriya tries to pull the ball by moving towards leg, he gets hit on the glove or the arm and the ball drops at his feet
tight line and length around off stump, the ball keeps a little low and Jayasuriya plays outside the line and gets beaten, Dhoni was also beaten by the second bounce
defended on the front foot towards the off side
full length on off and middle, Jayawardene uses the angle into him and closes the face to play the ball towards midwicket
low full toss from Irfan which Jayawardene drives off the front foot towards mid-off

short of a length on leg stump, Jayawardene moves across and glances the ball off his hips towards fine leg where Ishant dives but can't cut it off, good effort though, far better than his fielding last evening
worked towards fine leg again, Ishant has been placed finer and stops it this time

dropped even though Praveen didn't even get a hand on it, Jayasuriya mis-timed the hit over mid-on but Praveen was late to react, he backpedaled rather slowly and the ball went over his head for four, he could have caught it if he had moved back quicker
now Jayasuriya charges and lofts a short of a length ball over cover for four, he's looking to take the fight to India now
he tries to hit the ball over cover again by moving down the track but gets beaten this time
cut towards deep point for a single
the slower ball bowled full outside off, Jayasuriya waits for it and pushes towards cover

loud appeal for lbw as Jayasuriya misses the pull and gets hit on the back leg, the length wasn't short enough to pull, the ball hit him on the thigh so perhaps it was a bit too high, close call though
defended back to the bowler on the front foot

too full on leg stump, Jayasuriya moves on to the front foot and lifts the ball over midwicket for four, how many times have we seen him play that? He's looked edgy today but that was struck supremely
the slower ball on a good length to end the over, Jayasuriya defends on the off side
good length from Pathan on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the bowler
Jayawardene moves forward and across his stumps and paddles the ball behind square, Ishant runs in from fine leg and fields
Jayasuriya tries to work the ball off his hips with the angle into him but misses and gets hit on the thigh
now he charges Pathan and lofts the ball from short of a length over cover for four more, he can do this confidently against Pathan's gentle pace

Jayasuriya stands in his crease and smashes a good length ball hard at mid-on where Ojha is on the edge of the circle, the ball bounces a few feet in front of him and he mis-fields to allow the boundary
Pathan's bowled a loose ball down leg side, Jayasuriya gets a bit of bat on it and it's enough to beat Dhoni and run towards fine leg for four more, Pathan's gone for 26 off two overs
flicked off the pads behind square for one more
short of a length on middle stump, Jayasuriya stays in his crease and defends on the off side, he hasn't charged Ishant as yet
and on cue he steps down the track and makes room by moving towards leg, Jayasuriya wanted to hit that over cover but was beaten by a slower ball outside off stump

caught down the leg side again! Ishant banged in another short one down leg side, Jayasuriya attempted to pull the ball but only managed to glove it towards Dhoni who didn't have to dive this time to take the catch
good length delivery pitches outside off and angles into the right-hander, defended on the front foot towards the off side
too full outside off stump, Kapugedera hardly moves his feet while playing the drive through extra cover but he's hit it superbly through the infield
he starts off with a loose ball, full and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene leans forward and caresses the drive through cover, splendid timing, lovely balance
now the line is a bit too straight and Jayawardene flicks through midwicket, Pathan gives chase
short of a length outside off stump, Kapugedera waits on the back foot and guides the ball towards Raina at backward point, the batsmen hesitate a bit but run the single in the end
left alone outside off stump by Jayawardene
short of a length outdid off stump, Jayawardene uses the room created by the angle across him to cut towards third man
short ball outside off stump, the batsman lets it go
tight line and length on off stump, defended towards the leg side on the front foot
excellent call, Jayawardene pushed the good length ball from off and middle gently towards mid-on and immediately called Kapugedera through
the length is a bit shorter outside off and Kapugedera waits on the back foot and drives towards cover point
fuller length on middle and leg stump, Kapugedera leans forward and tries to work the ball off his pads but doesn't connect properly
this time Kapugedera does flick the full ball off his pads towards fine leg where Ojha sprints to his right across the boundary and dives full length to save the four,  well done!
Ishant bowls the slower ball on a good length around off stump, Kapugedera defends on the front foot towards point
good length delivery on middle and off stump, Jayawardene comes on to the front foot and drives towards cover point
shot! but it doesn't beat the infield, Jayawardene moved forward to a  fullish delivery outside off and punched it towards cover
pushed towards cover off the front foot once again
too full on the pads, Jayawardene flicks and connects well but he's placed it straight to midwicket, RP was lucky it didn't go for runs
good length this time on off stump, defended on the back foot on the off side
tight line and length on middle, Jayawardene pushes the ball towards mid-on off the front foot
short of a length and wide outside off from over the wicket, Kapugedera cuts towards point
excellent length and line, pitches around off stump and slants away from the right-hander, Kapugedera pushes forward but gets beaten
Pathan's keeping it close to off stump, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
good length once again on middle and off, Kapugedera gets behind the line on the back foot and defends
short of a length on middle and leg, worked off the pads towards square leg for one
shot! Jayawardene moves forward and drives a full ball in front off the fielder at point, there's protection in the deep though
good length delivery on off stump, defended on the back foot towards point
good length from RP, he pitches it around off stump and slants it across the right-hander, Kapugedera tries to drive through the off side without moving his feet and gets beaten
short of a length on off stump, Kapugedera punches off the back foot towards cover
outstanding placement, Kapugedera moves on to the back foot and drives a short of a length delivery between the fielders at point and cover for four
the line is much wider outside off stump this time but the low bounce beats Kapugedera's attempted cut
closer to off stump this time, Kapugedera defends solidly from his crease
a good length delivery pushed off the front foot towards point for a quick single
shot! The length is too full outside off stump and Kapugedera leans into a perfect off drive and sends the ball racing wide of the fielder at mid-off
nudged off the pads towards square leg for a single
Jayawardene leans forward and drives a fullish delivery towards cover
short of a length and rather wide outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts but can't beat the fielder at point
Pathan ends the over with a delivery in the block hole, Jayawardene defends on the off side
short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot towards point where Yuvraj makes a half save
the length is too short and Jayawardene swivels and pulls the ball cleanly over midwicket for four, he hit that off the front foot
width offered once again outside off stump, cut towards point off the back foot
good length from Praveen on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
the slower ball at 119 kmh outside off stump, Jayawardene tries to cut but gets beaten by some springy bounce
that's rather wide outside off stump and a freebie for Jayawardene who stays in his crease and cuts towards the point boundary
good length from Irfan on middle and off, defended on the back foot by Kapugedera
full and wide outside off stump, Kapugedera moves on to the front foot and lashes the square drive past point for another boundary
he angles the first ball into Kapugedera's pads and he works the ball behind square
full and too wide outside off stump, Jayawardene had to reach out for it and drive the slower ball through cover
another slower one on off and middle, Kapugedera stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
tossed up on off stump, defended on the front foot
flighted delivery outside off stump, defended once again on the front foot
drifts on to leg stump this time and Kapugedera sweeps towards fine leg
Kapugedera gets on to the front foot and pushes the ball towards the leg side for one
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Jayawardene moves forward and closes the face to play the ball through square leg
played towards the leg side on the front foot
comes round the wicket and fires it in outside off, he drives to deep cover to bring up the fifty stand
gives him width outside off, he makes a bit of room and deliberately dabs it to third man
Irfan's struggling here, he fires that on the blockhole outside off, he opens the face of the bat late and digs it past backward point who dives and lets it slip through
cuts back on the pace but bowls it wide outside off, he steers it down to third man
bangs it in short and directs it at his body, he swivels and pulls it down to fine leg
half volley outside off, he drives it on the full just wide of extra cover and picks up a couple
tossed up on off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and drives towards long off for one
no room to work with for Kapugedera who pushes the ball from off and middle to the off side
defended on the front foot towards point
pushed off the front foot towards long off
defended on the front foot once again
Kapugedera pushes the final ball towards cover point for one
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
shoddy effort at point, short and wide and Kapugedera  cut it firmly towards Raina who let it go through him
fuller ball on middle and leg, Jayawardene tries to flick but gets beaten by a slightly slower ball
short of a length on middle stump, Jayawardene moves back and across and works the ball behind square
Kapugedera comes forward and pushes the ball towards midwicket for a single
flicked off the pads towards deep square leg once again
looped through the air on off stump, hardly any turn so far, pushed off the front foot towards point
Kapugedera moves forward and drives a full ball towards cover
driven firmly back towards the bowler, Ojha dives to his left and makes the save
wicket to wicket line from Ojha, defended back towards him by Kapugedera
Kapugedera pushes hard at a good length ball on off and chips it in the air towards Ojha's left, it's out of his reach
driven off the front foot towards long off for a single
that's streaky, Jayawardene cuts a good length delivery which is too close to him and gets a bottom edge into the ground past Dhoni past two more
pushed off the front foot towards cover
played with an open face behind point
Kapugedera guides the ball towards third man for one more
Jayawardene drives off the front foot towards long off to reach his fifty, it's been a calm innings from him
punched off the front foot towards long off for one more
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
tossed up on leg stump, Kapugedera sweeps towards long leg
Jayawardene's holed out! He steps down the track and lofts Ojha towards Gambhir at long off who takes an easy catch, he wasn't to the pitch of the ball and didn't try and hit it with power
flighted delivery on middle stump, Silva leans forward and closes the face to play the ball through square leg
tossed up on off stump, Silva strides forward and defends on the off side
flatter ball on off stump, Silva defends back to the bowler
driven towards long on for a single
defended on the front foot towards the off side
cut off the back foot through point for one more
bowled wide outside the off stump, Kapugedera reaches out and drives the ball off the front foot through cover
Silva drives but gets beaten outside the off stump
Silva strides forward and defends a flighted delivery towards the leg side
cut off the back foot through point for another single
Silva steps out of his crease but defends because he isn't to the pitch of the ball
Silva opens the face and plays the ball towards short third man
poor ball, too much on leg stump, Silva sweeps and makes good contact, Pathan fields on the deep backward square leg boundary
pushed towards cover off the front foot for a quick single
played off the pads on the back foot through midwicket
quicker delivery outside off, Kapugedera gets beaten
Silva moves back and cuts towards point
Kapugedera brings up his 50 by working the ball off his pads towards fine leg
pushed off the front foot towards point for one
Silva uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and drives through midwicket
Kapugedera moves right back and pushes the ball off his pads through midwicket
Kapugedera waits in his crease and cuts the ball towards the fielder on the point boundary
Silva comes down the track, gets to the pitch of the flighted delivery and drives towards the off side
pushed towards the off side on the front foot
nice flight from Ojha on off stump, Kapugedera drives towards cover
tossed up on middle and leg, driven towards long on for one more
tossed up once again on off stump, Silva comes forward and drives to long off
Sehwag bowls it flat outside off and gets a bit of turn into the right-hander, cut off the back foot through point
worked off the pads through square leg for one more
Silva strides forward and defends towards the off side
Silva gets on to the front foot and plays the ball behind point
Sehwag strays down leg side, Kapugedera misses the leg glance but it's a wide
Kapugedera plants his front foot forward and picks up the ball from outside off and hits with the turn, he's connected well and the ball sails over the deep midwicket boundary
defended on the front foot and they steal a single
Kapugedera plays the slog sweep but this time hasn't timed it all that well, it falls safely in the deep
defended on the front foot towards the  leg side
Kapugedera moves on to the back foot and punches towards long off
terrible fielding, Ojha pitches outside leg from over the wicket and Silva sweeps powerfully towards long leg where Pathan ran towards his left and over-ran the ball
played towards short fine leg for one more
defended on the front foot towards the off side
defended on the leg side off the front foot
Silva works the ball off his pads behidn square for one
Kapugedera tries to work the ball behidn square but gets beaten
played on the leg side for a single
Silva defends on the front foot
Silva nudges towards the leg side for a single, Dhoni runs to the ball and throws hard at the bowlers end and concedes an over throw
tossed up from over the wicket on middle stump, driven off the front foot towards long off
Kapugedera gets down on one knee to sweep but can't beat short fine leg
Silva plays the slog sweep to deep midwicket
Silva moves back and hits the ball through midwicket
Silva cuts a short of a length delivery towards point and there's a mix up between the batsman, the throw to the bowler's end is poor though and India concede more over throws
punched off the back foot towards long off for a single which brings up Sri Lanka's 200
good length ball on off stump, defended off the back foot
Silva tries to cut one that's too close to him and gets a bottom edge behind square on the off side
Silva leans across his stumps and flicks the ball from middle stump towards square leg, Silva runs quickly for the second and dives to make his ground
Silva moves forward and works the ball off his pads towards square leg once again
Kapugedera waits in his crease and guides a short of a length delivery outside off stump towards the third man boundary, that may have looked like an edge but he controlled it well
shot! Silva's got down on one knee and played a terrific slog sweep, he placed it in the gap between deep square leg and deep midwicket but he didn't need to for he sent it  over the boundary
swept once again towards fine leg for two more
bowled quicker through the air, defended on the front foot
blocked on the front foot towards the off side once again
Silva waits for the ball to drift onto him and nudges on the leg side
Kapugedera takes a step forward and pushes the ball past Ojha towards long off
good length and line around off stump, punched off the front foot towards cover
good length close to off stump, Kapugedera waits in his crease and opens the face of the bat to play the ball to point

lbw! Praveen bowls a short of a length delivery that pitches in line with the stumps and goes straight through, Kapugedera moves forward and tries to play across the line towards midwicket, he plays around the ball and gets hit in line with the stumps
short length and Dilshan gets off the mark by pulling to deep midwicket
fuller ball outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
bowled full, angling into middle stump, pushed towards cover by the batsman
Silva steps out of his crease and pushes the ball towards point for one
Dilshan leans forward and nudges towards point for one more
Silva pushes the ball towards point and initially doesn't look for the single but sets off once he sees Dilshan sprinting towards his end
Dilshan throws his bat at a wide ball and cuts it into the gap between backward point and short third man
pushed off the front foot towards the off side for one more
Ojha ends his spell with a dot ball, he pushes it through outside off and Silva lets it go
played towards point where Sharma dives to make the stop
Dilshan pushes the ball towards point and sets off for a single, Silva sends him back and he makes his ground before Sharma hits the stumps, they run an overthrow of the ricochet
too wide outside off stump, Silva throws his bat at it but can't reach the ball
fuller length and straighter, Silva nudges towards square leg for one
good length on off stump, defended off the back foot towards the off side
fuller length on off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover where Yuvraj fields
the length is short and Dilshan swivels and pulls the ball into the gap at deep backward square leg, Ojha dives on the boundary but can't quite stop it, good effort though
full length outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
Dilshan tries to cut but the ball is too close and he gets beaten
fuller and straighter line on middle and leg, Dilshan pushes the ball back to Pathan who fields on his follow through
full length outside off, driven off the front foot through cover
short of a length on middle stump, pushed off the back foot with soft hands towards cover for one
flicked off the front foot towards midwicket, only three runs off Pathan's seventh over
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Silva cuts the ball towards third man
Dilhsan also cuts one that's short of a length outside off, he places it to the fielder at point
Dilshan cuts once again but can't beat the man in the infield at point
Ishant bowls a well-directed yorker on middle stump which Dilshan digs out towards midwicket and runs the single
Silva gets on to the front foot and defends a good length ball towards the off side

lovely placement, Silva waits for a short of a length delivery just outside off stump and cuts it late, he's placed it fine enough to beat the fielder at point and wide enough to beat the man at third man
the length is a little short and Dilshan pulls the ball in the air towards deep midwicket where Raina runs in to field
fuller length outside off stump, Silva reaches out and drives the ball to Ojha on the cover boundary

caught! and well caught! The length was short on leg stump, terrible ball really, Dilshan swiveled and pulled the ball hard and flat towards fine leg, RP was on the boundary and he timed his jump perfectly to take the catch, he took one look to see where he had landed after completing the catch but he was inside the boundary

he gets a bouncer first up and ducks straight into it, the ball bounces off the helmet and runs towards the fine leg boundary for leg byes, why the fielding team should be penalised for that I have no idea, it's a silly rule, in my opinion at least
he's off the mark by pushing the ball towards cover for a single
Silva moves forward and pushes the ball towards cover point for  a single
Silva waits in his crease for a short of  a length delivery and plays it late towards point for a single
Weeraratne stands in his crease and tries to hit the ball down the ground, Ishant's pace made the ball hurry on to the batsman but he manged to play it to mid-off for a single

Silva pushed the ball towards Sharma at point and Weeraratne set off for the single, Silva sent him back and Sharma had plenty of time to line up the stumps and throw them down, he missed and Weeraratne survives
played towards third man for a single
banged in short and down leg side as well, that's a wide
edged and four! Weeraratne threw his bat at a good length ball, he was looking to hit through cover and the edge flew wide of Dhoni for four to third man
short of a length from Ishant close to off stump, Weeraratne tries to cut but gets beaten
good length delivery angling across the right hander, Silva opens the face and pushes towards point where Sharma fumbles
pushed towards Sharma at point once again, this time he fields cleanly
Silva strides forward and drives on the up towards long off for a single
good length delivery angling into the left-hander, Weeraratne punches back towards the bowler and RP gets a hand on it
slower ball angling into the left-hander, Weeraratne drives towards wide long on and the batsmen complete the second easily
Weeraratne tries to loft a good length ball down the ground but the mis-hit falls short of Pathan at mid-off

Silva's run out! He moves forward to a short of a length ball and opens the face to run the ball towards third man, Silva returns for the second run but RP swoops on the ball and fires the throw back to Dhoni who breaks the stumps in time to beat Silva's full length dive, incidentally Silva was on 49 so he completed his 50th run before being run out on the 51st
Thushara pushes the ball towards point and runs the single, Sharma throws the stumps down at the bowler's end but the batsman is home
full ball outside off stump, Weeraratne reaches out for it and places the ball between point and third man for four
good length delivery and Weeraratne tries to pull the ball, he hits it to Yuvraj at midwicket
short ball and Weeraratne backs away and tries to pull once again but misses, he gets hit on the body and gets a leg bye
good length ball outside off stump, driven of the front foot through cover for  a single, Ishant's finished his spell which included the wickets of Jayasuriya and Sangakkara
good length ball on off stump, Thushara drives off the front foot towards long on where Gambhir fields
that's a very short ball and Weeraratne plays a powerful pull shot in front of midwicket for four, he's picked it up from outside off and placed it in the gap
this time he steps out and drives a fuller ball through cover for  a single, Raina's in the deep
the slower ball outside off stump beats Thushara's attempt to run the ball towards third man
super placement! Thushara moves forward and plays a well-timed square drive that beats Sharma at point and also beats the fielder running to his left at third man
RP ends the over with a good length delivery outside off which beats Thushara
Weeraratne plants his front foot forward and slogs the ball towards wide long-on where Ishant runs to his left and fields
driven off the front foot towards cover for a quick single
slower ball angling into off and middle stump, Thushara waits for it and opens the face to play the ball towards third man
Weeraratne moves forward and drives a good length ball from outside off towards cover
he was looking to bowl a yorker but delivered a low full toss which Thushara worked towards deep square leg
good length delivery outside off stump, Weeraratne stays on the back foot and opens the face to play the ball to third man

caught at long on! RP pitches on a good length outside off and angles it into the left-hander, Weeraratne moves forward and tries to clear the long-on boundary, he hasn't got enough on it and Gambhir runs it to take a well-judged catch
Thushara tries to pull but doesn't make proper contact, he hits it with the glove behind square
good length delivery angling across the right-hander, Kulasekera fends from his crease and gets beaten
edged and four! Kulasekera stays in his crease and pokes at the ball angling across him, he gets an edge which runs towards the fine third-man boundary
short of a length delivery on middle stump, Kulasekera jumps back and nudges towards the leg side
Thushara hits the ball straight past the bowler and brings Gambhir at long on into play
he's got away with a full toss, Thushara tried to pull but didn't make proper contact, he was looking to hit it over the deep square leg boudnary but only managed to get it as far as short square leg
Kulasekara gets his front foot out of the way and tries to hit over midwicket, he gets an inside edge that runs through square leg
he's hit that! The length of the slower ball is a little short and Thushara smashes it with a flat bat over Ishant's head at long on to bring up the 300
another slower ball on a very hittable length and Thushara obliges by smacking it with a flat bat straight down the ground for four

Thushara's run out! He cut the ball hard towards third man where Gambhir fumbled the take, Thushara wanted the strike and hared back for the second, the throw came back to Dhoni who had to stretch to break the stumps because he was rather far away from them, Thushara was inches short even though he dived, did Dhoni break the stumps with the ball in his glove? It's too close to call
Murali hits the final ball towards midwicket for a single, Sri Lanka finish on 308 for 8. India had made 308 last evening against Pakistan.

inn2.comm: he starts off with a short ball that slants across Gambhir from over the wicket, forcing him to sway out of the way
another short ball angles across the left-hander but this time Gambhir stands on the back foot, gets under the ball and cuts it over slips for four
short and wide this time and Gambhir stays in his crease and slaps it over backward point for a one-bounce four
Fernando pitches this fuller but the line is down leg side, Gambhir tries to play a leg glance but the ball is too far away from him
full on the pads once again, Gambhir misses the flick and gets hit on the pad for a leg bye
poor line but Fernando gets away with it, the ball was slanting down leg side and brushed Sehwag's pad, Sangakkara dived to his left to collect it
Sehwag opens the face of the bat to run the ball towards third man, 11 runs off that over from Fernando
good line and length on off and middle stump, Sehwag gets behind the line an defends back to the bowler
Kulasekera hasn't given Sehwag room so far, this one is on a good length on off stump, Sehwag stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
worked off the pads towards square leg
Gambhir leans forward to a  good length ball and drives towards wide mid-off where Murali runs to his right and fields
Kulasekera angles the ball into the right-hander, Sehwag moves forward and drives to Murali at mid-on
full ball nearly in the block hole around off stump, Sehwag brings his bat down hard and squeezes it through point for a single, third man is placed square and he cuts it off
tight line and length on middle stump, Sehwag moves half forward and defends with bat close to pad
short of a length outside off stump, the ball comes off the pitch a little slower and Sehwag moves across to defend on the back foot
short of a length on middle and leg, Sehwag works the ball through square leg
poor line, short of a length on leg stump, Sehwag gets inside the line of the ball and glances it off his hips towards the fine leg boundary
fuller ball on the pads, Sehwag leans across and whips the ball uppishly towards fine leg
Fernando's overstepped and delivered a full and wide ball outside off stump, Gambhir chased and tried to drive through cover but missed, he has a free hit coming up though
he's made it count! Gambhir backs away to a length delivery around off stump and cuts the ball in front of point for a boundary, Fernando's gone for 22 off his first two overs, Pathan went for 26
Kulasekera maintains the wicket to wicket line on off and middle, Sehwag uses the angle into him to push towards mid-on

that's a very risky single, Gambhir tried to push on the off side but got an inside edge on to the pad, Sehwag set off for the run but Silva came sprinting in from point and under-armed it at the stumps, Sehwag might have just got home had the ball hit
pushed towards Kapugedera at cover off the front foot
Sehwag stands in his crease and punches on the up towards cover
full ball outside off stump, Sehwag waits for it and opens the face to play the square drive behind point, he squeezes it out and places it wide of the fielder at third man

pushed towards cover for another risky single, Kapugedera misses the throw at the runner's end, Sehwag would have been out had he hit, the fielder backing up shies at the batsman's end and concedes overthrows
short of a length, on off, Gambhir drops it with soft hands, looks for a single but decides against it
again back of a length, slightly outside off, Gambhir blocks it towards mid-on for a single
shortish again, this time on the right-handed Sehwag's pads, helped to fine leg
short on off , again soft hands from Gambhir, thinks of a quick single  but there's none there
full on leg and middle, Gambhir leans across and flicks off his pads for a boundary to midwicket
slower ball, reverts to back of a length, some width, Gambhir tries to cut it but is beaten
shortish, in the channel, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
repeat of the previous delivery, good line from Kulasekara
length ball, on off, sliced towards cover, batsmen scamper through for a single
another quick single as Gambhir pushes an off-stump delivery towards mid-off
Shot! full on the pads and Sehwag deposits it to the long-on boundary with superb timing
defended off the back foot by Sehwag
short of a length, some width outside off, dabbed to third man
length delivery, on off, Sehwag cuts it towards third man
Thushara's keeping it tight here, on off, Gambhir plays it towards point, no run
another one, this time Gambhir drops it just front of square on the off, quick single, direct hit, but batsman was in
short ball, angling away from Sehwag, he shapes to pull but abandons the idea at the last moment
quick bouncer, Sehwag ducks under it
Gambhir takes two steps out of his crease and opens the face to guide a good length delivery towards point
short of a length delivery skids through on Gambhir who moves forward and punches to mid-off
short of a length once again outside off stump, Gambhir punches towards cover, Sehwag is backing up and the fielder shies at the bowler's end
Gambhir walks out of his crease once again and this time the line is on leg stump, allowing him to flick off his pads to the deep square leg boundary
the length is shorter and the bounce is lower, Gambhir tries to cut but gets beaten
once again Gambhir moves forward and towards off stump, Kulasekera bowls a shorter delivery forcing Gambhir to defend towards point
width offered outside off stump and Sehwag stands in his crease and eases the drive past mid-off for four more, lovely timing
short of a length on middle and leg, tucked off the hips towards square leg
too straight on middle and leg, poor line when fine leg is in the circle, Gambhir works the ball off his hips past the fielder at short fine leg for four more

short of a length outside off stump, the ball bounces a bit more and beats Gambhir's attempted cut, there was a bit of a noise as the ball passed the bat but no one appealed, must have been something else
pushed off the front foot towards point
Gambhir stays in his crease and opens the face to guide the ball towards third man
that's too wide outside off stump, Gambhir slashes but can't reach it
straighter line and length on middle stump, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
good length delivery on off stump, pushed towards short cover on the front foot
Gambhir leans on to the front foot and drives a length delivery towards cover
he's smacked that! Gambhir charges the bowler and smashes the ball past the fielder at mid-on with a low of power
he steps out once again but has to cut towards point for the length is shorter, Sehwag is keen on the single after Dilshan didn't collect cleanly but Gambhir sent him back
pushed towards mid on for a single
delicate and deft, Gambhir moves forward and towards the off side, he opens the face to guide the ball towards the third man boundary
this time he stays in his crease and waits for the ball to come to him before opening the face to play the ball to third man
short and wide outside off stump, Sehwag flashes hard at it but gets beaten
short of a length on middle stump, Sehwag moves back and across and whips the ball off his hips through midwicket for four
short ball angles across him, Sehwag tries to get under it and chip it over the wicketkeeper, like Tendulkar did against Lee in Australia, Sehwag couldn't make contact
he's connected with this! Sehwag stays in his crease and pulls a length delivery over midwicket, the ball bounces just inside the boundary
good length delivery on off stump, slanting across the left hander, Gambhir leans forward and drives through cover
Gambhir takes a walk down the pitch and Kulasekera sprays the ball wide outside off stump
fuller ball on middle and off, Gambhir stays in his crease and drives towards long off
not much the bowler can do about that, the length was perfectly acceptable on middle stump, the pitch is so slow that Sehwag had time to line it up and smack it over midwicket for four

caught! Kulasekera bowls a slower ball on leg stump, Sehwag moves across his stumps and chips the ball straight to Fernando at short fine leg, the line was poor and the shot was on but Sehwag got beaten by the change of pace
good length delivery on off stump, Raina stays on the back foot and punches towards cover
short ball and Raina uses it to get off the mark by pulling to the deep midwicket boundary

huge appeal for caught behind and Thushara can't believe it, Gambhir tried to cut a short of a length delivery outside off stump and missed, can't really say if there was an edge but the Sri Lankans had no doubt, Jerling turned it down, replays indicate a faint edge
cut off the back foot through point for a single
Gambhir pushes another good length delivery to point off the back foot
another short of a length delivery outside off, Raina gets beaten
Raina chases a wide delivery outside off stump, looking for the booming drive through cover and gets beaten
played towards third man with an open face for a single
Gambhir moves out of his crease once again and cuts the ball towards third man
Gambhir stays in his crease because Sangakkara is standing up to the stumps and drives towards short cover
Gambhir pushes off the front foot towards cover once again
Gambhir plants his front foot down the pitch and tries to slog over the leg side, he mis-hits it to mid on
pushed off the front foot towards backward point
good length on off stump, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
fuller length outside off stump, Raina drives off the front foot towards deep cover
Raina punches the ball from outside off stump on the up towards the fielder on the cover boundary, he hit that with power
Gambhir steps down the track towards the off side and lofts the ball over wide mid-on for four, that boundary brings up his fifty
fuller length from Thushara,  driven off the front foot towards Silva at deep cover
Raina moves back in his crease and defends a good length delivery towards point

is Raina run out? He sliced the ball in the air towards wide third man where Kulasekera fielded the ball on the bounce and threw it back to Sangakkara who broke the stumps quickly, Raina was just home
Raina tries to slog across the line of a good length delivery, he was hoping to send the ball over deep midwicket but got beaten instead
Gambhir drops the ball with soft hands towards the off side and runs the quick single
Raina waits in his crease and pushes the ball in front of point for a single
too full on the pads, Gambhir leans forward and flicks towards the man on the deep backward square leg boundary
the slower ball at 119 kmh, Raina defends on the back foot towards the bowler
fuller length on off stump, Raina comes forward and defends towards the off side
Fernando strays down leg side, it appeared to brush something on the way through to Sangakkara who dived to his left and did well to stop it, it's been given as a run
dropped, Raina leant forward to a good length ball and punched it on the up straight to Jehan Mubarak, the substitute, at cover, the ball was hit hard and it burst through Mubarak's hands
played down to third man for a single
Thushara draws Raina forward with a good length and beats the bat with a hitn of movement away from the left-hander
another good length delivery outside off stump, Raina pushes off the front foot towards point
Gambhir steps out of his crease and defends a good length ball on the leg side
short and wide outside off stump, Gambhir steps out of his crease and cuts the ball in the air but over point for four
Raina comes on to the front foot and defends a good length ball on the off side
Raina waits on the back foot for a short of a length delivery and punches the ball through cover for a single
Gambhir charges Fernando who sees the batsman coming and shortened his length, Gambhir is in an awkward position and tries to pull but gets betaen
Gambhir waits in his crease for a slower ball and guides it towards third man
Raina jumps on to the back foot to get behind the line of a good length ball and defends
another slower ball from Fernando at 118 kmh, Raina defends off the back foot to the off side
Gambhir steps down the track and hits Murali against the spin towards midwicket
bowled quick on middle and off, Raina pushes the ball off the back foot towards the off side
Raina strides forward to cover the spin and nudges the ball towards square leg for one
that's the doosra which pitches outside off and turns into the left-hander, Gambhir cuts off the back foot towards point
Raina moves back and plays a slightly shorter ball towards cover
Raina gets down on one knee and sweeps to long leg
Raina opens the face and guides the ball towards third man off the front foot
short of a length delivery at 120 kmh on middle stump, Gambhir taps it towards backward point and asks Raina if he wants the single, he doesn't
an excellent yorker from Fernando on middle stump, Gambhir digs it out
that's too short and Gambhir transfers weight on to the back foot and pulls the ball in front of the fielder on the square leg boundary
now he charges down the track and tries to pull again, Fernando bangs it in short and Gambhir bottom edges it into the pitch
short of a length on leg stump, Gambhir moves across and nudges the ball off his hips behind square
Raina moves back to pull a short ball that spins across him, he hit it to midwicket from outside off

lbw! Gambhir steps out of his crease and tries to flick, he misses and gets hit low on the front pad, the Sri Lankans appeal confidently and Jerling raises the finger, Gambhir's front foot was a long way out of the crease
Dhoni strides forward and defends on the off side
defended on the off side on the front foot
defended on the back foot towards the off side
Dhoni pushes the ball towards point and sprints the single to get off the mark
good length delivery outside off stump, Dhoni waits on the back foot and lets the ball go
Dhoni defends on the back foot back to the bowler
good length delivery once again outside off stump, Dhoni lets it go through to Sangakkara
left alone once again outside off stump, Dhoni watched it closely and decided not to play a shot
huge appeal for lbw as Dhoni tries to play across the line and misses, the length was full and it was angling into the right-hander, it may have just missed leg stump
played off the pads behidn square for a single
cut off the back foot towards point, the asking-rate has inched up over six an over
Murali rips the offbreak back into Dhoni after drifting it across him, he opens the face and plays it behind point
pushed off the back foot towards the off side
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Raina lunges forward and tries to work the ball on the leg side, the leading edge lobs up but falls well short of Murali
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket for a single
Raina welcomes him by planting his front foot forward and lofting Weeraratne through the line back over his head for four
Raina moves on to the back foot and pushes the ball towards midwicket for a quick single
Dhoni pushes hard at a ball which angles into him from outside off and gets a thick outside edge to third man
Raina moves on to the back foot and forces a short of a length ball to mid on
Raina moves back and across and nudges the ball towards square leg
good length ball on off stump, Raina leans forward and punches towards long off
nudged off the back foot towards midwicket for a single
bowled flat through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot

tossed up across the right-hander, Muralitharan is approaching from over the wicket and running between the umpire and the stumps before delivering from round the wicket to the right-hander, Dhoni plays the ball behind point
Raina steps out of his crease, gets to the pitch of the ball and dispatches it to the deep midwicket boundary with a wristy flick
played off the back foot through midwicket
Dhoni leans forward and defends a flighted delivery on the leg side
Raina flicks the ball off his toes towards the fielder at fine leg
Dhoni strides forward and drives a good length ball firmly to mid off and runs the single, the throw uproots a stump at the bowler's end but Dhoni is safe, they run an overthrow off the rebound
short of a length outside off, defended off the back foot towards point
Dhoni leans forward and drives the ball hard towards point
short of a length around off stump, Raina moves back in his crease and punches towards long off
fullish delivery outside off stump, Dhoni leans forward and drives firmly towards cover
Raina moves back and pushes the ball towards point for a single
Dhoni moves forward and works the ball off his pads for a single
Raina moves back and picks the doosra which spins into him, he pushes towards cover
Raina moves across on the back foot and flicks through midwicket
Dhoni moves back and punches the ball towards long off, Murali bowled that flatter through the air
Raina once again moves across and works the ball off his pads towards square leg
Raina waits in his crease for a short of a length delivery and drives through cover
Dhoni moves forward to a good length delivery and opens the face to play the ball towards third man
Raina moves back and places the ball through covers, he's hit it wide of the fielder in the deep and the batsmen have time to complete the second
Raina moves back and across and plays a punchy drive through cover
driven firmly off the front foot but to Murali at mid off
pushed off the front foot towards cover
Dhoni lunges forward and drives towards long off for a single
Raina works the ball deftly off his pads for a single to square leg
worked off the pads towards square leg for one
Raina punches towards mid-on but midwicket runs across and cuts it off
pushed towards cover off the back foot, Dhoni doesn't want the run
Raina flicks off his pads behind square for a single
Dhoni leans on to the front foot and drives towards mid-off where Murali runs to his left and stops it with his boot
Raina moves back and pushes the ball towards mid-on where Murali once again is the fielder
Dhoni stays on the back foot and cuts towards point
played off the back foot through point
Dhoni drives the full toss through midwicket for two more
Dhoni leans forward and drives through cover point for one
Dhoni steps out of his crease and plays the ball towards long on
Raina tries to work the ball behidn square but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye
Dhoni charges down the track but gets beaten in the flight, he manages to hit the ball to long on
defended towards midwicket off the back foot
Raina pulls the ball in the air to deep midwicket, the fielders shout "catch it" but the ball falls well short
Dhoni moves back and cuts the ball through cover point for one
Dhoni moves his front pad way outside the line of off stump and sweeps towards long leg
Raina moves back and works the ball towards midwicket
short of a length wide outside off stump, Dhoni moves back and cuts the ball hard through point for a single
a low full toss and Dhoni drives the ball back at the bowler who stops it with his boot
Dhoni tries to drive a good length ball from wide outside off stump, he gets a thin bottom edge on it and Sangakkara isn't able to react quickly enough, the ball goes through his legs for four
Dhoni moves on to the front foot and pushes towards cover
Jayasuriya fires one down leg side, that's a wide
Raina pushes the ball off the back foot through point for  a single
Dhoni lunges forward and pushes a flat delivery from off stump towards cover
Raina moves on to the back foot and pushes the ball towards long on
Dhoni comes forward and flicks the ball through midwicket for a single
Raina moves forward and plays the ball behind point for a single
Dhoni moves forward, gets under the ball and lofts it powerfully over long off, there's a man on the boundary but the ball clears him, it was Fernando on the boundary
lots of turn for Murali across the left-hander, Raina tries to cut but misses
this is the straighter one and Raina moves back and forces the ball towards point , he brings up his 50 with that shot
tossed up outside leg stump, Dhoni swivels and plays a sort of a drive past the wicketkepeer for four to fine leg
defended on the back foot
Dhoni stays in his crease and defends towards the off side
Raina moves forward and punches the ball in front of point for one
Dhoni moves on to the back foot and plays the cover drive through the gap, he sprints back for the second
shot! Dhoni reaches his fifty with a forceful drive off the back foot through cover for four, he drove that on the up
Dhoni moves forward and drives a slower ball straight past the bowler for two more
now he moves forward and across and drives a full ball from off stump towards Fernando at mid-on
banged in short, that's too high and it's been called wide
short of a length outside off stump, Raina stands on the back foot and cuts wide of the fielder on the cover boundary, they run two more
Dhoni takes a step out to a flighted delivery and drives towards long on
pulled off the back foot towards square leg
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket

Raina's run out, Dhoni plays the lap shot once again to one that's outside leg stump and plays the ball towards fine leg, Jayasuriya gives chase and the batsman run two, they want the third and Raina sprints back and dives full length in a desperate attempt to make his ground, his bat is well over the crease when Sangakkara breaks the stumps but the blade is in the air because of the impact with the ground
defended on the front foot
Yuvraj tries to sweep one that pitches outside leg, the ball lobs up towards backward point

Dhoni moves forward and across and works the ball towards midwicket, Dhoni wants the second but Yuvraj isn't so sure, he hesitates and would have been out by a long way had the throw to the bowler's end been a good one
Dhoni pulls the ball towards deep backward square for two more
slower ball on a good length on off stump, Dhoni drives past the bowler for one
now Thushara's bowled an excellent bouncer which has hit Yuvraj on the helmet and gone for for leg byes, I'll say it again, it's a silly rule
another sharp short ball and Yuvraj tries to pull, he gets an inside edge on to his body, he's in a bit of pain
outstanding shot, the length is too full on middle and leg, he was looking for the yorker but over pitched it, Yuvraj flicks through the gap at midwicket for four
Dhoni moves on to the back foot and drives the ball through the gap at cover for four
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
bowled flat and quick outside off stump, Dhoni moves back and plays the ball towards the bowler
tossed up slowly outside off stump, Dhoni pushes towards point off the front foot
Yuvraj steps out of his crease but gets beaten by the flight, the ball hits him on the pad and they run a leg bye

bowled him! Murali pitched the ball outside off stump, it was a quicker one and the ball spun into the right-hander, Dhoni tried to work the ball towards point off the back foot but it was too straight for the shot, he missed and the ball clipped the top of off stump
Yuvraj drives the ball towards long on for a single
short of a length delivery on off and middle, Sharma comes forward and defends
Sharma nudges the ball with soft hands towards cover and runs the single
Yuvraj moves back and punches a short of a length ball through covers
Yuvraj strides forward and opens the face to play the ball towards backward point
short of a length on leg stump, Yuvraj jumps back and nudges the ball off his hips towards Murali at fine leg
tossed up outside off stump, Sharma leans forward and blocks
that's the straighter one outside off, Sharma waits on the back foot and plays the ball behind point, Sharma seemed to twinge something as he turned for the second and couldn't go for it
bowled flat through the air on middle and off, Yuvraj moves back and hits the ball through midwicket
tossed up on middle stump, Sharma leans forward and defends back to the bowler
Sharma moves forward and closes the face of the bat to play the ball behind square
tossed up across the left-hander from over the wicket, Yuvraj tries to drive through cover but it might have been the doosra for he got a thick inside edge on to his pad
driven towards long off for one, Dilshan's bowling from over the wicket
Dilshan goes round the wicket for Yuvraj and bowls a flat delivery which is defended back to the bowler
driven through midwicket off the front foot
bowled flat through the air on off and middle stump, pushed towards long on for a single
Yuvraj steps out to a flighted delivery and drives towards long on
Sharma moves deep in his crease and punches the ball to long off for a single to end the over
short of a length on off stump, driven off the back foot towards cover
Sharma waits for the ball to angle into him and then closes the face to play towards midwicket
full length on off stump, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
short ball on leg stump, Sharma gets inside the line by moving towards the off and helps it along to the fine-leg boundary with a controlled hook
driven off the front foot towards the off side
a full ball in the block hole, Sharma comes forward and digs it out towards midwicket
Yuvraj leans forward and uses the angle into him to work the ball to square leg
shorter length and Yuvraj goes back and pulls towards deep midwicket
Sharma stays in his crease and taps the ball towards long off for a single
Yuvraj steps forward and drives a full ball towards long on for one
Sharma gets on to the front foot and drives to long on, India are cruising towards the target
Yuvraj moves back and pulls the ball to long on, there's no real urgency out there at the moment
driven towards long off, that's one run less that India need
Sharma stands tall and drives the ball back towards Kulasekera who bends down on his follow through and gets some hand on the ball
Kulasekera strays down leg side this time and the ball bounces a second time before Sangakkara and beats him as well
Sharma moves forward and across and pushes the ball to long on for one
Yuvraj smashes a low full toss straight back at Kulasekera who sticks his boot out bravely (or foolishly) and stops it, that had to hurt but Kulasekera showed nothing
Yuvraj picks up a length ball and launches it over deep midwicket with a powerful pull shot, tremendous hit, not much elevation but plenty of distance
played to point off the back foot
tossed up outside off, driven off the front foot to long off
bowled flatter outside leg from over the wicket, Yuvraj moves back and defends
Yuvraj winds up, gets down on one knee, and plays a powerful sweep to Fernando at deep backward square leg
Sharma moves forward and across and plays with the turn to midwicket
worked off the pads behind square for one more
Yuvraj steps out and chips the ball in the air but through the gap at midwicket, Murali finishes his spell with 2 for 44
short of a length on off stump, Sharma gets behind the line and defends
that's a quick delivery outside off stump, Sharma reaches out without moving his feet and gets beaten
short of a length outside off, Sharma guides the ball towards third man off the back foot
fuller length on off stump, driven off the front foot through cover
cut off the back foot towards third man
the short of a length delivery stops on Yuvraj who in turn stops his pull and ends up chipping the ball in the air towards midwicket
another full toss and Yuvraj has driven it hard back to the bowler who gets his hands to the catch near his left shoulder but he couldn't hold on, that was hit very hard
now Sharma hits the ball hard in the air back towards the bowler, the ball beats him and runs to the straight boundary
pushed towards cover of the front foot
India have got four of the seven they need to win via a powerful pull off the back foot from Yuvraj
that's it, Yuvraj has sealed India's qualification for the final with a blistering drive through extra cover for four, the ball was another full toss from Kulasekera
